fullText:
Stubborn Spirit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Dwarf, shaman, call spirit companion power
Benefit: When an ally adjacent to your spirit companion is subjected to forced movement, you can dismiss your spirit companion as a free action. This lets you reduce the number of squares the ally would be forcibly moved by a number equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 14.
